summary: The mighty warrior, Kain, crosses the barren wastelands of the planet Ura, where two arch enemies, Zeg and the evil degenerate Balcaz, fight incessantly for control of the village's only well.
cast: David Carradine|Luke Askew|María Socas|Anthony De Longis|Harry Townes|Guillermo Marín|Armando Capo|Daniel March|John Overby|Richard Paley|Marcos Woinsky|Cecilia Narova|Dylan Willias|José Casanova|Miguel Zabaleta|Herman Cass|Arturo Noal|Hernán Gené|Gus Parker|Ned Ivers|Liliana Cameroni|Eva Adanaylo|Noëlle Balfour
keywords: murder of a nude woman|murder|female nudity|outer space|bare chested male
director: Director: John C. Broderick (as John Broderick)
title: El guerrero y la hechicera
